name: Leavanny
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: Upon finding a small Pokémon, it weaves clothing for it from leaves, using the cutters on its arms and sticky silk.

attacks.name: Nurturing
attacks.effect: Choose 1 of your Pokémon. Search your deck for a card that evolves from that Pokémon and put it onto that Pokémon. (This counts as evolving that Pokémon.) Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 more damage.
